issue.title: [Rust] Arrow `memory` made private is a breaking API change
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11322](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11322). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We depend on functionality in the Arrow memory module for buffer building and this was recently made private. 

 

Please make this module public again.
